title: Shock Index, Pediatric Age-Adjusted (SIPA)
desc: The Pediatric Age-Adjusted Shock Index (SIPA) calculates shock index (SI), adjusted for age, to predict mortality in children.

orgreference.text: Acker SN, Ross JT, Partrick DA, Tong S, Bensard DD. Pediatric specific shock index accurately identifies severely injured children. J Pediatr Surg. 2015;50(2):331-4.
